channel.title: Allstar ReMADE!
channel.description:
[center]Well I decided to make a Remade Version of allstar although it ain't the most popular source... Anyways, besides just editting ::home places, ::skills, ::train. I will be actually coding some shit.
BTW this is straight off allstarscape v1 I wanted to code most of the things myself.
-Dfs Making 200 crafing required -1 connection per ip(also protects null) -A server panel -Phats have strength bonus so people pk with them (rage's idea) -Added donator system (quick snippet) -Added Xp Lamps And rare rewards credit to rage -New Starter equipment -Anti null -Saves Char files before restart (removes rollback) -High Scores Board updated -1 click pickup -Deleted ALOT of un-needed codes -Fixed Trade scam -max level is now 200 instead of 99 -Money making lowered (::skills like mining, wcing, theiving, etc) -Fixed all dupes -Removed blood rune lag -Added Random timer for Auto clicking -Added the Guthans Effect(Works against players and npcs
And believe it or not my server can hold up to atleast 70 players+ So it's pretty stable
I will be posting pictures soon! [size=24pt]20% DONE[/size]
As for the other 'allstar remakes' i am planning on finishing this one :D
[/center]

item.title: Allstar ReMADE!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Coder Eddie, post:15, topic:412702”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=514178.msg3750273#msg3750273 date=1315966379]

hate all-start,add media?,good luck
[/quote]All-star is a really bad source cause of the fuckload of customs, but hey! It’s a hell of a lot of fun!

ik it is :)[/quote]Delta is amazing though. I actually prefer delta over PI. Reason being I NEVER had any problems with delta (lag, dcing, etc) but with PI it happened all the time. Which is why I’m back to delta! That and for the learning experience.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Coelho:

Allstar isn’t good, which makes me wonder why people are still using it. Pointless project is pointless.

Post isn’t good, which makes me wonder why people are still posting like this. Pointless post is pointless…

Good luck with the project, but the 1 connection per ip, doesn’t fix the nulling.

item.title: Allstar ReMADE!
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
item.description:
@weeddamn wrote:

[center]Well I decided to make a Remade Version of allstar although it ain’t the most popular source… Anyways, besides just editting ::home places, ::skills, ::train. I will be actually coding some shit.

BTW this is straight off allstarscape v1 I wanted to code most of the things myself.

-Dfs Making 200 crafing required
-1 connection per ip(also protects null)
-A server panel
-Phats have strength bonus so people pk with them (rage’s idea)
-Added donator system (quick snippet)
-Added Xp Lamps And rare rewards credit to rage
-New Starter equipment
-Anti null
-Saves Char files before restart (removes rollback)
-High Scores Board updated
-1 click pickup
-Deleted ALOT of un-needed codes
-Fixed Trade scam
-max level is now 200 instead of 99
-Money making lowered (::skills like mining, wcing, theiving, etc)
-Fixed all dupes
-Removed blood rune lag
-Added Random timer for Auto clicking
-Added the Guthans Effect(Works against players and npcs

And believe it or not my server can hold up to atleast 70 players+ So it’s pretty stable

I will be posting pictures soon!
[size=24pt]20% DONE[/size]

As for the other ‘allstar remakes’ i am planning on finishing this one

[/center]
